i1.name: Friend of the Forest
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Ivern''' cannot attack nor damage non-epic {{tip|monster|monsters}}. Instead, targeting a jungle camp initiates a {{fd|2.5}} second {{tip|channel}} that will plant a {{as|grove|buzzword2}} upon the camp. Placing a {{as|grove|buzzword2}} costs {{sti|health|{{as|{{pp|(23.5-x)/100*({{ccd|Ivern|hp_base}}+{{ccd|Ivern|hp_lvl}}*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1)))|formula = (23.5% - 1% per level) of base health}} health}}}} and {{sti|mana|{{as|{{pp|(34.5-1.5*x)/100*({{ccd|Ivern|mp_base}}+{{ccd|Ivern|mp_lvl}}*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1)))|formula = (34.5% - 1.5% per level) of base mana}} mana}}}}. The channel cannot be cancelled in the first {{fd|0.15}} seconds and in the last {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
'''Ivern''' cannot place a grove while he is unable to cast abilities.

The {{as|grove|buzzword2}} matures over {{pp|40;38;36;34;32;30;27;24;21;18;15;11;7;3;1|formula = 42 - 2 per level until level 6, then 3 until level 11, then 4 until level 15. ''This is capped at 1 second at level 15.''}} seconds. When fully matured, '''Ivern''' can target the camp again to ''free'' it after a {{fd|0.5}}-second [[Channel#Casting Times|cast time]], clearing the camp and receiving the {{tt|{{g|full gold}} and {{sti|experience|{{as|full experience}}}}|Not full when freeing Krug camp, see notes}} [[bounty|bounties]]. Using {{si|Smite}} on a monster within the {{as|grove|buzzword2}} will instantly ''free'' the camp regardless of maturity.

If the camp's large monster has already been slain prior to planting a {{as|grove|buzzword2}}, '''Ivern''' will ''free'' the camp upon completing the channel at no cost. Similarly, the {{as|grove|buzzword2}} will instantly mature if the large monster is slain.

Starting at level 5, freeing the {{ui|Red Brambleback}} or the {{ui|Blue Sentinel}} leaves behind a ''sapling'' for 60 seconds that can be gathered by one allied {{tip|champion}} to gain the camp's buff. If an ally kills either monster, they also leave behind a ''sapling'' that only '''Ivern''' can consume.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Ivern cannot attack nor damage non-epic monsters. Instead, targeting a jungle camp initiates a 2.5 second channel that will plant a grove upon the camp. Placing a grove costs (23.5-x)/100*(Unknown value: ccd Ivern hp_base+Unknown value: ccd Ivern hp_lvl*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1)))undefined − (based on level) health and (34.5-1.5*x)/100*(Unknown value: ccd Ivern mp_base+Unknown value: ccd Ivern mp_lvl*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1)))undefined − (based on level) mana. The channel cannot be cancelled in the first 0.15 seconds and in the last 0.5 seconds.
Ivern cannot place a grove while he is unable to cast abilities.
The grove matures over 40;38;36;34;32;30;27;24;21;18;15;11;7;3;1undefined − (based on level) seconds. When fully matured, Ivern can target the camp again to free it after a 0.5-second Channel#Casting Times, clearing the camp and receiving the full gold and full experience bounty. Using Smite on a monster within the grove will instantly free the camp regardless of maturity.
If the camp's large monster has already been slain prior to planting a grove, Ivern will free the camp upon completing the channel at no cost. Similarly, the grove will instantly mature if the large monster is slain.
Starting at level 5, freeing the Red Brambleback or the Blue Sentinel leaves behind a sapling for 60 seconds that can be gathered by one allied champion to gain the camp's buff. If an ally kills either monster, they also leave behind a sapling that only Ivern can consume.
i1.notes:
* Freeing a {{tip|Krugs}} camp will only give the {{g|gold}} and {{sti|experience|{{as|experience}}}} of the present ''Krugs'', i.e the {{ui|Ancient Krug}} and a ''Medium'' {{ui|Krug}}, for a total of {{sti|experience|{{pp|(55+15)*(1+0.25*(x^3-x)/60)|1 to 7 for 4|type=monster's level|changedisplay=true|formula=''This is capped at monster's level 7.''|color=experience}} experience}} instead of {{pp|55+15+15*2+10*6; 55+15+15*2+10*6; (55+15)*1.025+15*2+10*6; (55+15+15*2+10*6)*1.025; (55+15)*1.1+(15*2+10*6)*1.025; (55+15+15*2+10*6)*1.1; (55+15)*1.25+(15*2+10*6)*1.1; (55+15+15*2+10*6)*1.25|type=monster's level|formula=''This is capped at monster's level 7, but effectively capped at level 8 because of additional krugs spawning with one less level.''|color=experience}}, and {{g|75 gold}} instead of {{g|125}}.
* '''Ivern''' must be within {{tip|er|icononly = true}} 275 units of the {{tt|large monster|if still alive}} of the targeted camp to start channeling or collect a {{as|grove|buzzword2}}. The large monsters also must be {{tip|sight|visible}}.
* If '''Ivern''' cannot afford the cost to place a grove, ''Friend of the Forest'' is placed on a cooldown equal to the number of seconds it takes for his {{stil|health regeneration}} and/or {{stil|mana regeneration}} to restore him to the amount of health and/or mana needed to afford the cost.
** The cooldown will update based on '''Ivern's''' '''current''' health and mana regeneration, as well as his '''current''' health and mana.
* ''Friend of the Forest'' can be used while '''Ivern''' or the camp is in combat and, once the {{as|grove|buzzword2}} is placed, {{si|Smite}} can be used to instantly claim the camp. {{tip|Interrupt|Interrupting}} '''Ivern's''' channel is the only way to contest jungle camps, short of killing the camp during the channel time.
* ''Friend of the Forest'' will leave '''Ivern''' at {{as|1 health}} if cast with exactly the required amount. ''Friend of the Forest'' cannot be cast with less, unlike other abilities with health costs.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Ivern''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
** '''Ivern''' is unable to act during the first {{fd|0.15}} and last {{fd|0.5}} seconds of the channel.
{{ct|channel|cast=interrupts|items=interrupts,true,,false|spells=true,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts|interrupts=death, silence|damage=true}}

q1.name: Rootcaller
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ivern''' throws a vine in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit and {{tip|root|rooting}} them for a short duration, during which they are also {{tip|sight|revealed}}. ''Rootcaller'' can be recast while the target is {{tip|root|rooted}}.

'''Ivern''' and allied champions can select the target {{tip|root|rooted}} by ''Rootcaller'' to {{tip|dash}} to their location, with allies stopping at {{tip|er|icononly = true}} {{sti|their attack range}} and '''Ivern''' stopping within {{tip|er|icononly = true}} {{sti|range|125 range}} from the target.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ivern throws a vine in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and rooting them for a short duration, during which they are also revealed. Rootcaller can be recast while the target is rooted.
Ivern and allied champions can select the target rooted by Rootcaller to dash to their location, with allies stopping at er their attack range and Ivern stopping within er 125 range from the target.
Recast: Ivern dashes to the target.
q1.notes:
* ''Rootcaller'' will fire from wherever '''Ivern''' was at the start of the cast time.
* ''Rootcaller'' will hit {{tip|monster|monsters}} but does not deal damage to them unless they were an epic monster.
* '''Ivern's''' pull/attack range is determined when he dashes to the target - not from when he initially casts ''Rootcaller'' and throws the vine.
* '''Ivern''' is not able to dash to the target unless they are within approximately 1200 range.
** {{Pending for test}}: This also counts for allies.
* ''Rootcaller'' {{tt|cannot be used|By either clicking on the target or Ivern recasts}} to {{tip|dash}} while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}. This applies to '''Ivern''' and his allies.
* ''Rootcaller's'' dash does not follow targets, their position at the time of starting the dash is the location '''Ivern''' and his allies will stop from.
* '''Ivern''' and his teammates cannot dash to a target if the root was not applied to them.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 70% AP)

  • Root Duration:

w1.name: Brushmaker
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} While in '''Ivern''' is in {{tip|brush}}, his basic attacks deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}. This bonus persists for 3 seconds after leaving brush.
'''Ivern''' periodically [[stocks]] a ''Brushmaker'' charge, up to a maximum of 3.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Ivern''' grows a patch of {{tip|brush}} at the target location for 30 seconds, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area within and around it for 3 seconds. ''Brushmaker'' spawns more brush if used near [[terrain]] or other brush.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: While in Ivern is in brush, his basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. This bonus persists for 3 seconds after leaving brush.
Ivern periodically stocks a Brushmaker charge, up to a maximum of 3.
Active: Ivern grows a patch of brush at the target location for 30 seconds, granting sight of the area within and around it for 3 seconds. Brushmaker spawns more brush if used near terrain or other brush.
w1.notes:
* The {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} applies to towers.
* The {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} can be {{tip|block|blocked}} or {{tip|dodge|dodged}}.
** {{Pending for test}}: Passive's interactions with {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects.
w1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '0' as '0' and riot's value '0.5,0.5,0.5,0.5,0.5' as '0.5'

effects.str: • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 30% AP)

e1.name: Triggerseed
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ivern''' can target an allied champion, {{ui|Daisy}}, or himself to place a {{tip|shield}} for 2 seconds.
The target then explodes to deal {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow}} nearby enemies for 2 seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ivern can target an allied champion, Daisy, or himself to place a shield for 2 seconds.
The target then explodes to deal magic damage and slow nearby enemies for 2 seconds.
e1.notes:
* The explosion occurs regardless of whether the shield is maintained.
* Placing ''Triggerseed'' on allied champions grants them all [[kill]] credits it causes.
* The {{as|magic damage}} benefits from '''Ivern's''' {{sti|{{as|magic penetration}}}}.
** The seed will only trigger '''Ivern's''' [[spell effects]] if it was placed on him or {{ui|Daisy}}.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 80% AP)

  • Slow: %

r1.name: Daisy!
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ivern''' summons his sentinel friend {{ui|Daisy}} to his side, who lands 350 units away from him in the target direction and remains on the field for up to 60 seconds as a controllable {{tip|pet}}.
''Daisy!'' can be recast at any time while {{ui|Daisy}} is alive.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Ivern''' commands {{ui|Daisy}} to move to the target location. If cast on '''Ivern''', {{ui|Daisy}} will follow him.
''The recast of Daisy! can be used while affected by {{tip|cast-inhibiting crowd control}}.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ivern summons his sentinel friend Daisy to his side, who lands 350 units away from him in the target direction and remains on the field for up to 60 seconds as a controllable pet.
Daisy! can be recast at any time while Daisy is alive.
Recast: Ivern commands Daisy to move to the target location. If cast on Ivern, Daisy will follow him.
The recast of Daisy! can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
r1.notes: * ''Daisy'', when the ability is initially cast, is {{tip|untargetable}} until she lands.
